swamithwaya[sanskaranaya karanna] 1785 wasarehi ehi samarambhayehi sita da tayims sandaha pahatha dakwena ayithikaruwan atadena sita atha: 1785 sita 1803 dakwa – jon woltar; 1803 sita 1847 dakwa – jon woltar, dewana; 1847 sita 1894 dakwa – jon woltar, thewana; 1894 sita 1908 dakwa – aathar fresar woltar; 1908 sita 1922 dakwa – northklif samiwaraya; 1922 sita 1966 dakwa – astar pawula; 1966 sita 1981 dakwa – royi thomsan; 1981 sita warthamanaya dakwa – niwus yuke (peradi, rupat mardok wisin pawathwagena yana, niwus korphi purna himikamathi upangayak wana, niwus intarnashanal ).

ampara – theldeniya pradeshawala sidu wu le waki siddhidamaye maha molakaru kolambaa disthrikkayen parlimenthuwata pamini, jathika andum adina, usa hindari hadayaku bawa jathika nidahas peramune nayaka wimal wirawansha mahatha helikara sitiyeya.

sima nirnaya kamituwa penwamin mathiwarana kal dama ganimata palath palana ha palath sabha amathyawaraya da, dan ejapa ya dakwana uthsahaya kafe sanwidhanaya dadiwa hela dakina athara sima nirnaya kamitu warthawa athsan thabima sadaha ejapa niyojithayata balapam karana lesa siyalu siwil sanwidhana ha deshapalana paksha wethin illa sitimu.
me parlimenthu therim karaka sabhawa wadath sarthakathwayak athkara gaththe, samahara wita, eki karaka sabha sasiwara janamadhyayata wiwara kirima nisa wiya hakiya.

madhyama parisara adhikariye paryeshana ha wishesha wyapruthi eekakaya magin mema daththa paddhathiya godanagana bawath jana ha sankhya lekhana departhamenthuwa, minindoru departha menthuwa, wanajiwi sanrakshana departhamenthuwa, wana sanrakshana departhamenthuwa ha purawidya departhamenthuwa aadi rajya aayathana sathu daththa upayogi karaganimin mema parisarika daththa paddhathiya nirmanaya karana bawa madhyama parisara adhikariye sabhapathiwaraya wadiduratath sandahan kaleya.
mema grand slam shuratha meheyawanu labanne antharjathika tenis sammelanaya (ayi. ti. ef.) wisini.

shri pada wandana waraya awasan wimath samaga palmadulla raja maha wiharasthanaye gaman maligawa dakwa eeye (19) rathriye wadama keru sadathuka karaduwa saman dewa prathimawa saha dewabharana ada (20) paswaru 3 thek bathimathunta wada puda ganimata awasthawa salasa di athi bawa shri padasthanadhipathi bengamuwe dhammadinna nayaka swamin wahanse pawasiya. 2018-2019 shri pada wandana waraya wesak poho dinayen awasan wimen pasu shri pada uda maluwe thanpath kara thibu sadathuka karaduwa saman dewa prathimawa saha dewabharana shri pada uda maluwe sita nallathanniya dakwa lakshapana yudha hamuda kadawure niladharin saha bhata piris wisin eeye (19) paswaruwe pahalata wadama karanu labuwa.
